casebody.data:
Mahoning County Bar Association v. Coyle.

[Cite as Mahoning Cty. Bar Assn. v. Coyle (1997), 80 Ohio St.3d 278.]

*279(No. 97-1286 Submitted August 26, 1997 Decided November 19, 1997.) *280Jay Tims and John T. Dellick, for relator. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusion, and recommendations of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
